name: Thrym Winterhowl
description1: Snow Fort: Place a 100 shield and remove trap [0 pips]
description2: Brisk Blast: Deal 25 damage and gain 1 pip if you have a shield / trap [0 pips]
description3: Shatter Squall: Deal 50 damage and clear enemy blade for 75 trap [1 pip]
description4: Winter Blast: Deal 100 damage or 225 damage if your team has a minion [2 pips]
description5: Ice Fortress: Place a 200 shield and remove trap on all teammates [4 pips]
description6: Artic Blast: Deal 225 damage to all enemies or 350 damage if your team has a minion [6 pips]
description7: Bracing Frost: Place a 100 shield and clear mantle for a pip [0 pips]
description8: Blizzard Wind: Deal 225 damage and gain a 125 shield for self [4 pips]
description9: Shatterstorm: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and clear enemy blade for 200 trap [6 pips]
description10: Freeze Blast: Deal 150 damage and stun enemy if they have a DoT [2 pips]

name: Varg Thundergrowl
description1: Catalyze: Place a 50 blade and remove a DoT [0 pips]
description2: Thunder Gaze: Deal 25 damage and stun enemy [1 pip]
description3: Storm Surge: Place a 200 blade and a 100 blade if target already has a blade / mantle (does not stack) [2 pips]
description5: Sheet Lightning: Deal 100 damage to all enemies and remove a DoT from whole team [3 pips]
description6: Sea King's Thunder: Deal 225 damage and stun all enemies [6 pips]
description7: Turbocharge: Place a 100 blade and a 50 shield if target has a HoT [1 pip]
description8: Feeding Frenzy: Deal 100 damage and gain 2 pips if enemy has a trap [2 pips]
description9: Voltaic Phoenix: Deal 225 damage or 300 damage if you have a HoT [3 pips]
description10: Avenging Marid: Deal 150 damage to all enemies or 250 damage if you have a DoT [4 pips]

name: Skoll Sunchaser
description1: Trickster's Bite: Steal enemy shield then deal 50 damage [0 pips]
description2: Call Of The Pack: Summon minion [0 pips]
description3: Feral Tenacity: Deal 150 damage and clear trap for 100 shield to self [2 pips]
description4: Show Of Force: Deal 150 damage and gain a 200 shield for self [4 pips]
description5: Strength Of The Pack: Target minion and place a 200 shield on whole team and a stun block [4 pips]
description6: Doggone Frog: Deal 225 damage to all enemies and clear traps from team for a 100 shield [6 pips]
description7: Shake It Off: Push shield and clear mantle for a 100 shield [1 pip]
description8: Vile Veterinarian: Push mantle to enemy then deal 50 damage [0 pips]
description9: Mad Dog: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a -50 accuracy mantle if enemy has a DoT [5 pips]
description10: For The Pack!: Sacrifice minion to give whole team a 100 shield and a double pip, 2 turn bubble [3 pips]

name: Varg Windhowler
description1: Grimbite: Deal 50 damage and place a 50 weakness if enemy has more than 50% of their HP [0 pips]
description2: Haunting Howl: Taunt for 2 turns [0 pips]
description4: Howl Of Horror: Place a 150 weakness on an enemy and a 50 weakness on whole team if you have taunt active (does not stack) [2 pips]
description5: Steal All Hope: Place 150 weaknesses on all enemies and steal a HoT [4 pips]
description6: Teeth Of Pain: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a 75 weakness if enemy has more than 50% of their HP [5 pips]
description7: Protect Packmate: Place a 75 shield or a 150 shield if target has taunt activated [1 pip]
description8: A Taste Of Fear: Deal 150 damage and clear enemy blade for 75 shield for self [2 pips]
description9: Chilling Growl: Place a 225 weakness and steal enemy HoT [3 pips]
description10: Howl Of Ill Omen: Deal 225 damage to enemy. Steal it instead if enemy HP is over 50% [3 pips]

name: Tyr Honor-claw
description1: Lousy Thief: Swap blade / mantle then deal 50 damage [0 pips]
description2: Scuttling Scorpion: Deal 100 damage and clear enemy shield for a 50 trap [1 pip]
description3: Double Down: Swap blade / mantle and gift 2 pips [2 pips]
description4: Imperil: Place a 100 trap on enemy and a protected 100 blade on self [2 pips]
description5: Stalking Smilodon: Deal 200 damage and gain 1 pip [3 pips]
description6: Scouring Sand: Place 100 traps on all enemies and protected 150 blades on team [5 pips]
description7: Incitement: Gift 3 pips and clear blade / mantle for a 100 blade [3 pips]
description8: Sudden Flare: Deal 100 damage and gain a pip if enemy has a blade / mantle [1 pip]
description9: Vengeful Ronin: Deal 200 damage to all enemies [4 pips]
description10: Hunting Howl: Place a 50 blade, 4 turn bubble [2 pips]
